text: Maureen Elizabeth Reagan (January 4, 1941 - August 8, 2001) was an American television and movie actress. She was the first child of Ronald Reagan and his first wife, Jane Wyman. Her brother was Michael Reagan (adopted). She also had a sister, Christine, who died shortly after birth. She also has a brother and sister from her father's second marriage, to Nancy Davis: Patti Davis and Ron Reagan. Maureen Reagan died from melanoma in Granite Bay, California. She was aged 60. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Children of Presidents of the United States Category:Deaths from melanoma Category:Reagan family
title: Maureen Reagan
